#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int c=1,t,n,ctr1,ctr2,ctr3,t1,t2;
	cin>>t;
	while(c<=t)
	{
		cin>>n;
		ctr1=0,ctr2=0,ctr3=0;
		t2=n;
		while(t2>0)
		{
			t1=t2;
			if(t1%2==0)
			{
				while(t1%2==0)
				{
					ctr1++;
					t1=t1/2;
				}
			}
			if(t1%3==0)
			{
				while(t1%3==0)
				{
					ctr2++;
					t1=t1/3;
				}
			}
			if(t1%5==0)
			{
				while(t1%5==0)
				{
					ctr3++;
					t1=t1/5;
				}
			}
			t2--;
		}
		cout<<ctr1<<endl<<ctr2<<endl<<ctr3<<endl;
		c++;
		
	}
	return 0;
}
